## DesignSystem.withShadowRootMode() method

Overrides the default Shadow DOM mode for custom elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withShadowRootMode(mode: ShadowRootMode): DesignSystem;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mode | ShadowRootMode | The Shadow DOM mode to use for custom elements. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DesignSystem](./fast-foundation.designsystem.md)
